## Help / FAQ
```{r, results='asis'}
generate_faq <- function(question, answer){
  cat(str_c('<h3 class="faq-question">', question, '</h3>'))
  cat(str_c('<p class="faq-answer">', answer, '</p>'))
}

cat('<div class="faq-content">')
content %>% 
  pwalk(generate_faq)
cat('</div>')
```
